name: OTP_ORDER_SPEC_QST
description: The order specific questions for an order template.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number that corresponds to each order specific question in the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_QUESN_ID
columns.description: The question (LQL) record ID of an order specific question in the order template in this row. Stores the history of the patient contact serial number (CSN) that the order template was signed in.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_QUESN_DT
columns.description: The contact date of an order specific question in the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_QUESN_RESP
columns.description: The response to an order specific question in the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_QUESN_CMT
columns.description: The comment on an order specific question in the order template in this row.

columns.name: IS_ANSWR_BYPROC_YN
columns.description: The Y/N flag for whether or not the question in the order template in this row should be answered per procedure.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_QUESN_COMP
columns.description: The order specific question component for the order template in this row.

columns.name: ORD_SPEC_QUESN_DTE
columns.description: The contact date in decimal format of the question.
